name: opencode-sessions
description: Enable multi-agent collaboration and advanced session management with persistent context, allowing multiple AI agents to work together on complex tasks with shared knowledge.

installation.summary: Install via npm to enable multi-agent collaboration with persistent session context and shared knowledge management.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

```bash
npm install -g opencode-sessions
```

Add to your OpenCode config:

```json
{
  "plugin": ["opencode-sessions"]
}
```

Restart OpenCode to enable advanced session management features.

usage.markdown:
## Usage

### Multi-Agent Collaboration
Coordinate multiple AI agents working on the same project:

```
/session create "Refactor authentication module"
/session add-agent backend-specialist
/session add-agent frontend-specialist
/session add-agent security-reviewer
```

### Persistent Context
- Share context across multiple agents
- Maintain project state between sessions
- Track decisions and changes
- Coordinate complex workflows

### Session Management
```bash
/session list              # View all sessions
/session switch <name>     # Switch active session
/session share <agent>     # Share context with agent
/session export            # Export session data
```

### Use Cases
- **Large Refactors**: Coordinate frontend, backend, and testing agents
- **Code Reviews**: Multiple reviewers with different specializations
- **Complex Features**: Break down work across specialized agents
- **Team Workflows**: Share context with team members

### Benefits
- Agents share knowledge and context
- Avoid repeating information
- Better coordination on complex tasks
- Persistent project memory
